ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.title: Mekanism[--通用机械--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.title: Big Reactor[--大型反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.subti: Construct a Fission Reactor[--建造裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.descr: The &bFission Reactor&r is a multiblock that &6generates a massive amount of heat&r, as well as some other byproducts. &cRead the entire next three quests before starting it.&r The Fission Reactor is &lincredibly&r dangerous, you may want to test in a creative world as well.[--&b裂变反应堆&r是一个多方块结构,可以&6产生大量热量&r以及一些其他副产物.&c在开始之前阅读接下来的三个任务.&r裂变反应堆&l非常&r危险,你可能需要先在创造存档中测试一下.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"我们为建造裂变反应堆添加了思索教程. 在裂变反应堆端口上查看思索,或者\"},{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\"也行.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.title: Radiation is Just Spicy Air[--辐射只是空气里撒点辣椒水--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.descr: &cRadiation&r can leak into the environment if certain things happen:[--如果发生某些事情,&c辐射&r会泄漏到环境中:--]
• Reactor meltdown\\n• Reactor running while full of Waste\\n• Breaking any block containing radioactive materials[--• 反应堆熔毁\\n• 反应堆在核废料满的时候运行\\n• 破坏任何含有放射性物质的方块--]
These materials are radioactive:\\n• Nuclear Waste (obviously)\\n• Polonium Pellets\\n• Plutonium Pellets\\n• Spent Nuclear Waste[--这些材料是放射性的:\\n•核废料(废话)\\n•钋球\\\n•钚球\\\n•用尽的核废料--]

Radioactive Waste is a gas that can be stored in &bRadioactive Waste Barrels&r. In fact, that's the &oonly&r place they can be stored. &6Shift-right click one&r to see how full it is.[--放射性废料是一种气体,可以存储在&b放射性废料桶&r中. 实际上,它们&o只能&r放在这里.&6Shift右击&r查看它的存储状态。--]

Waste Barrels will &6delete Waste at 1mB per second&r. As such, it's best to make a lot them. Environmental radiation also dissipates over time, but &cover a much longer period&r (50 in-game days). You &ccannot safely move them&r by any means.[--废料桶会&6以每秒1mB&r的速度删除废料&r.因此,最好做多一点.随着时间的推移,环境辐射也会消失,但&覆盖时间要长得多&r(50游戏天数)。你&c不能用任何方式安全移动它们&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.subti: Hazardous Environment Suit[--危险环境防护套--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.descr: The &bHazmat suit&r will &6insulate you from environmental radiation&r when worn.[--&b防辐射套装&r会&6使你免疫环境辐射&r.--]
The more you wear, the more protected you are. Frankly, it isn't even worth wearing only some of it without the rest.[--你穿得越多,保护得越好。说真的,只穿一部分还不如不穿。--]
Note, you are &cnot fully protected&r, just mostly.[--注意,你&c没有被完全保护&r,只是大部分.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.title: Radical[--原子基团--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.subti: Not great, not terrible[--不好,不坏--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.descr: When used, the &bGeiger Counter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Exposure&r where you are. Normal, safe background levels are aroung 100 nSv/h, &mwhatever those are&r.[--使用时,&b盖革计数器&r会告诉你你所在位置的&6辐射暴露&r.正常情况下,安全辐射背景等级是100nSv/h,&m不管现实里是不是有这么多&r.--]
The &bDosimeter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Dose&r. Basically, how irradiated you yourself are.[--&b放射量测定器&r会&6告诉你你当前的辐射量&r.基本上,就是你受到的辐射程度.--]
Obviously, higher numbers are worse. Green is safe, yellow is unsafe, orange is dangerous, and red is critical.[--很显然,数字越高越坏。绿色是安全,黄色是不安全,橙色是危险,红色是临界。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.title: Splitting the Atom[--分解原子--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.subti: Learn how to use the Fission Reactor[--学习如何使用裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.descr: The Fission Reactor &cdoesn't make FE&r, it makes &oheat&r. This heat is used to make Steam, which turns a &6Turbine&r, which makes FE.[--裂变反应堆&c不会产生FE&r,它会产生&o热量&r.热量用于生产蒸汽,转动&6涡轮机&r来产生FE.--]
Coolant can be either Water or Sodium. Water is simpler, but Sodium is more efficient (and therefore safer).[--冷却剂可以是水或钠。水更简单,但钠更高效(因此更安全)。--]

• &6Burn Rate&r is how fast fuel is being used\\n• &6Heating Rate&r is how fast coolant is being heated\\n• &6Temp&r is temperature. Temperatures above 1200K (926°C) &cdamages the Reactor&r\\n• &6Damage&r shows how close the Reactor is to a &cMeltdown&r, which causes a massive explosion and causes lethal radiation in a 5 chunk radius\\n• &6Activate&r turns it on, &6Scram&r turns it off[--•&6燃烧速率&r是使用燃料的速度\\n•&6加热速率&r是冷却剂加热的有多块\\n•&6Temp&r是温度。温度超过1200K(926°C)&c会损坏反应堆&r\\\n•&6损害&r显示反应堆离&c融毁&r的距离,在5个区块半径内产生巨大爆炸并产生致命辐射\\\n&6激活&r将其启动,&6急停&r将其关闭--]

At the bottom of the &6Statistics&r tab, you can set the &6Burn Rate Limit&r - that is, how fast fuel is burned. Higher Burn Limits mean higher temperatures and higher Heating Rates.[--在&6统计&r选项的底部,你可以设置&6燃烧速率限制&r - 即燃料燃烧的速度。更高的燃烧限制会有更高的温度和更高的加热速率.--]
&cBe warned&r: If the Heating Rate outpaces your ability to pump in Coolant, your Reactor will quickly overheat![--&c警告&r:如果加热速率超过你泵入冷却剂的冷却能力,你的反应堆会快速过热!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.subti: LASER, Caution LASER, Caution[--激!光! 小心激!光! 小心啊--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.descr: The &bLaser&r uses FE to shoot out a beam from its front end.[--&b激光&r使用FE从它的前端发射光束.--]
The Laser beam will damage any mob it touches, lighting them on fire. It will also mine blocks.[--激光束会伤害它接触的任何生物,点燃它们。也可以挖矿方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests6.descr: The &bLaser Amplifier&r can accept Laser beams from 5 of its sides, store their energy, then shoot it out the front.[--&b激光增幅器&r可以接受5面的激光束,存储能量,然后从前面射出.--]
In its GUI, you can set the &6minimum FE required&r to fire, as well as the &6maximum amount it can fire at once&r.[--在它的界面中,你可以设置发射的&6最小FE需求&r,以及&6一次发射的最大能量&r.--]
You can also set a &6Delay&r in ticks. The laser will emit for a short pulse, then wait the time set by the delay, then repeat.[--您也可以设置的&6缓存&r的时间刻. 激光会发出短脉冲,然后等待延迟设置的时间,然后重复.--]

If the Amplifier is &6not emitting&r the laser, other laser inputs are directly converted to stored FE. You can &6extract&r this with a Universal Cable configured to Pull. Other mods' cables will not work.[--如果增幅器&6不发射&r激光,其他激光的输入会直接转换存储为FE.你可以用配置为“拉”的线缆&6提取&r能量.其他模组的线缆不会有用.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests7.descr: The &bFusion Reactor&r is a rather complex multiblock, capable of generating extremely high amounts of FE.[--&b聚变反应堆&r是一个相当复杂的多方块结构,可以产生极高的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"我们为建造聚变反应堆添加了思索教程. 在聚变堆控制器上查看思索,或者\"},{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\"也行.\"}]--]

Once it's built, power it with &6Deuterium&r and &6Tritium&r, and &6jumpstart it with a Laser&r aimed at the Focus Matrix! It costs a burst of &6400 MFE&r to jumpstart, so make sure you're ready![--建造后,用&6氘&r和&6氚&r为它供能,然后&6用激光&r瞄准聚焦矩阵启动!它需要&6400MFE&r来启动,所以确保你准备好了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.subti: Steel Casings at last![--最终的钢质机壳!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.descr: &bSteel Casings&r are the basis of most of the mod's machines.[--&b钢机壳&r是mod大多数机器的基础.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.subti: Aren't we starting with frames!?[--我们不是从框架开始的吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.descr: One of the few mods where you actually need a machine to make Machine Casings.[--在几个模组中,你真的需要一个机器来制作机器外壳。--]
The &bMetallurgic Infuser&r is used to &6create alloys&r, most importantly being Steel.[--&b冶金灌注机&r用于&6制造合金&r,其中最重要的就是钢.--]
HINT: You dont actually need power to run this machine. You can power it with Redstone Dust in its power slot instead.[--提示:你真的不需要电力来运行这台机器。你可以在它的电槽中用红石粉为它供电。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.subt: Rich, Richer, Enrichment[--富集,再富集,更富集--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.desc: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r certain items, as well as &6refine ores&r... if you can get any.[--&b富集仓&r用于&6压缩&r某些物品,以及&6精炼矿石&r......如果你有的话.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.subt: First of many[--&2许多中的第一个--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.desc: With some Redstone and Iron you can finally start making some &bInfused Alloys&r.[--用一些红石和铁,你最终可以开始制作一些&b灌注合金&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.subt: Shiny Blue things[--闪亮的蓝色玩意--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.desc: &bReinforced Alloy&r are the next tier of Mekanism alloys.[--&b强化合金&r是下一等级的通用机械合金.--]
It is very suggested to use the &6Enrichment Chamber&r to get the most out of your infusing materials.[--非常建议使用&6富集仓&r来获得你最大利用量的灌注材料.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.subt: Look into my beautiful Eyes[--看看我漂亮的眼睛--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.desc: The final tier of &6Mekanism&r alloys - the &bAtomic Alloy&r[--最后一级&6通用机械&r合金 - &b原子合金&r--]
They also come in a fancy &5purple&r color[--它们也涂上了花哨的&5紫色&r--]
I'm sure, the Lord of Darkness will approve[--我敢肯定,黑暗之王会大力支持--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.subt: Circuits!? How do they work?[--电路!?它们如何工作?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.desc: Every decent Tech mod needs Circuits right? Luckily these aren't as complicated as Gregtech's.[--每个像样的科技模组都需要电路,对吗?幸运的是,这些没有格雷的复杂。--]
&6Mekanism&r &bCircuits&r only need a few parts and don't require a whole lot of microcrafting.[--&6通用机械&r&b电路&r只需要一些零件,不需要大量的微工艺.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.subt: Next down in line[--接下来走流程--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.desc: &bAdvanced Control Circuits&r are used for more advanced machines.[--&b高级控制电路&r用于更高级的机器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.subt: You know the Drill[--你知道规矩--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.desc: Crafted from the previous Tier, the &bElite Control Circuits&r are the next Circuit in line.[--下一步用上个等级材料制作&b精英控制电路&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests17.desc: Crafting the &bUltimate Control Circuit&r will grant you access to the highest tiers of the mod.[--&b终极控制电路&r制作完成，你离本模组最高峰又近了一步.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests18.desc: Applying a &bBasic Tier Installer&r to most &eMekanism&r machines will transform them into a &6Factory&r.[--对大多数&e通用机械&r机器使用&b基础工厂安装器&r会将其转化为&6工厂&r.--]
Factories have &6multiple processing slots&r, so you can make more compact setups.[--工厂有&6多个处理线&r,所以你可以更紧凑的摆放.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.subt: Make an Advanced Tier Installer[--制作高级工厂安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.desc: The &bAdvanced Tier Installer&r will convert Basic Factories to &6Advanced Factories&r, which have 5 parallel processing lines.[--&b高级工厂安装器&r将基础工厂转换为&6高级工厂&r,有5条并行处理线.--]
It is suggested to use &6Energy Upgrades&r to reduce the machine's energy usage.[--建议使用&6能量升级&r来减少机器的能量消耗。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.subt: Make an Elite Tier Installer[--制作精英工厂安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.desc: This &bElite Tier Installer&r gives you a whopping 7 slots of processing.[--&b精英工厂安装器&r可以给你7条处理线.--]
In addition to this, with some Speed upgrades, you can probably process all your resources with ease[--此外,再加上一些速度升级,你也许就能轻松处理你的所有资源--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests21.desc: &bElite Factories&r have &69 parallel processing lines&r.[--&b精英工厂&r具有&69条并行处理线&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.subt: Make a Chemical Injection Chamber[--制作化学压射室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.desc: The next step in ore processing is the &bChemical Injection Chamber&r.[--矿石处理的下一个步骤是进入&b化学压射室&r.--]
This will allow you to turn &63 Raw Ores into 8 Shards&r.[--这将允许你将&63个原矿变成8个碎片&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests23.desc: The &bCrusher&r is able to &6crush items&r.[--&b粉碎机&r可以&6粉碎物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.subt: Make a Purification Chamber[--制作一个提纯仓--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.desc: The &bPurification Chamber&r allows you to &6get more out of Raw Ores&r.[--&b提纯仓&r允许你&6进一步处理粗矿&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.subt: Make a Pressurized Reaction Chamber[--制作加压反应室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.desc: With the &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r  is what gates Mekanism's &6nuclear reactors&r. Prepare yourself for what's to come.[--&b加压反应室&r是通往通用机械&6核反应堆&r的大门。准备好面对未来吧。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests26.desc: The &bSolar Neutron Activator&r is used to convert one liquid into another, and is &6powered by the sun&r.[--&b太阳能中子活化器&r用于转化液体,并且&6由太阳驱动&r.--]
It can convert &6Lithium into Tritium&r, as well as &6Nuclear Waste into Pollonium&r.[--它可以将&6锂转化为氚&r,并将&6核废料转化为钋&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.subt: Make a Thermal Evaporation Chamber[--制作热力蒸馏塔--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.desc: Using the &bThermal Evaporation Chamber&r to create Brine is one of the first steps into getting Fusion Power.[--使用&b热力蒸馏塔&r制作盐水是获得聚变能的初始步骤之一。--]
You probably want to have atleast 2 &bThermal Evaporation Chambers&r.[--你可能要至少2个&b热力蒸馏塔&r.--]

The taller the multiblock, the faster it will work. Also, you can add &6Solar Panels&r on top, or &6Resistive Heaters&r on a Valve to increase the speed even further.[--多方块越高,它工作就越快。此外,你可以在顶部添加&6太阳能电池板&r,或者在阀门上添加&6电阻型加热器&r,以进一步提高速度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.subt: Don't spill your Waste![--别扔掉你的废料!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.desc: In the Solar Neutron Activator, you can convert &6Nuclear Waste&r into &bPolonium&r (with a side effect of making &cSpent Nuclear Waste&r).[--在太阳能中子活化器中,你可以将&6核废料&r转化为&b钚&r(有产生&c用尽的核废料&r的副作用)。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.subt: Have we reached Endgame yet?[--我们到达游戏末尾了吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.desc: The &bMekaSuit&r is an incredibly powerful &6upgradable armor set&r.[--&bMeka套装&r是一个非常强大的&6高级盔甲套装&r.--]
Its &6Upgrade Units&r can be intalled in the &6Modification Station&r.[--它的&6升级单元&r可以在&6改造站&r中完成.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.subt: Snap back to Reality[--转眼又回到现实--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.desc: The &bSupercritical Phase Shifter&r is a multiblock that uses a large amount of FE to &6convert Polonium gas into Antimatter gas&r.[--&b超临界移相器&r是一个使用大量FE将&6气体转换为反物质气体&r的多方块结构.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"在超临界移相器端口上查看思索,或者\"},{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\"查看如何建造.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests31.desc: The &bIndustrial Turbine&r is a &oreally&r complex multiblock that uses Steam to generate FE.[--&b工业蒸汽涡轮&r是一个&o非常&r复杂的多方块结构,使用蒸汽产生FE.--]
When used with Reactors, this will generate a massive amount of FE.[--与反应堆一起使用时产生大量的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"我们为建造蒸汽涡轮添加了思索教程. 在涡轮阀门上查看思索,或者\"},{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\"也行\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests32.desc: &bGas-Burning Generators&r take much more infrastructure, but generate much more power than earlier generators.[--&b燃气发电机&r需要更多的基础设施,但发电量比早期的发电机高得多.--]
You can start off by burning &6Oxygen&r, but &6automating Ethylene&r is basically an immediate jump to the midgame.[--你可以从燃烧&6氧气&r开始,但是游戏中期基本上就直接跳到&6自动化乙烯&r发电了。--]
